summary: What Is It? is a bewildering, unnerving, surreal, blackly comic film from the visionary mind of Crispin Glover that tells the inner and outer struggles of a young man facing villains and demons on multiple planes.
cast: Michael Blevis|Carlos Richardson|Lisa Fusco|Steven C. Stewart|Crispin Glover|John Insinna|Kelly Swiderski|Robin Adams|Adam Parfrey|Rikky Wittman|Lynn Conley|Cheryl Brown|Tom Carroll|Eric Yates|Mary P. Hayes|Fairuza Balk|Zoryna Dreams|Ivonna Earnest|Karin Odell|Muffy|Kiva
keywords: actual animal killed|written and directed by cast member|unsimulated sex|hand job|swastika
director: Director: Crispin Glover (as Crispin Hellion Glover)
title: What Is It?
